General.Name: Rockfire Resources plc
General.Description: Rockfire Resources plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mineral exploration in Australia. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, zinc, lead, and molybdenum deposits. It holds five exploration permits for minerals in Queensland; and an exploration and exploitation license in Greece. The company was formerly known as Papua Mining plc and changed its name to Rockfire Resources plc in June 2018. Rockfire Resources plc was incorporated in 2011 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 201 Temple Chambers, London, United Kingdom, EC4Y 0DT
